message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to start.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I think a 60/40 split is more reflective of the time pressure.  We both lose if this drags on.
Bob, time is money, but so is fairness. 51/49 is my final offer.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering 55/45. It's a good deal considering the time constraint and the fact that your potential gains are shrinking.
